entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.8Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
